Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1975...
Had first career hit on 5/16/1975, off Arthur Brown (Min)...
Traded from Plum Grove to Pontiac on 7/27/1977 (Going to PG: LF A. Cid, P J. White. Going to PON: 2B M. Pardue)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/14/1977, off Telmo Fierros (PIL)...
Traded from Pontiac to Syracuse on 2/5/1979 (Going to SYR: 2B M. Pardue. Going to PON: 1B B. Pope)...
Drove in 6 runs against Gashouse on 7/5/1979...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Boston (UBA) on 6/13/1980...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 6/19/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1980, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Longport on 4/26/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1984, hitting .520 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from Syracuse to Pontiac on 7/30/1985 (Going to SYR: SS C. Rodriguez. Going to PON: 2B M. Pardue, P W. Lavin)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Lynchburg on 8/15/1985...
